response.overview: You will be stunned to see the strange enmity between Shamsher Singh Rana and Dushasan. Just as a spark burns a forest to ashes, likewise the whole family of Rana who walks on the right path, turns into crematorium. What Dushasan does to the 12 year old sister of the hero of this film is unimaginable. Amar chases Dushasan to death on the streets of Nepal, Kathmandu. You will be shocked to see how the heroine of this film kills the goons of Dushasan by roaring like a lioness.
response.title: Mard Rickshawala
